title: A place where dreams begin
desc: Once we dreamt that we were strangers.We wake up to find that we were dear to each other.

title: And hid her face amid a crowd of stars
desc: To the world you may be one person, but to one person you may be the world.

title: 几米的猜想
desc: To see a world in a grain of sand.And a heaven in a wild flower.

title: 几米的猜想
desc: My heart,the bird of the wilderness, has found its sky in your eyes.

title: 几米的猜想
desc: The waterfall sing, I find my song, when I find my freedom

title: 几米的猜想
desc: Sorrow is hushed into peace in my heart like the evening among the silent trees

title: Two years ago
desc: What you are you do not see， what you see is your shadow

title: 几米的猜想
desc: Life is a chain of moments of enjoyment, not only about survival
